sentence: A federal judge threw out a lawsuit by three Florida residents who claim Governor Ron DeSantis trampled on Walt Disney Co.s freedom of speech, finding numerous holes in their filing and ruling the company can fight its own battle.
author: Katia Porzecanski
title: DeSantis Culture War With Disney Sees Lawsuit by Florida Trio Thrown Out

author: WND Staff
title: Disney tries to keep its special district, now federal judge issues ruling

sentence: The case is Michael Foronda v. Ron DeSantis in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Florida.
author: Sean Moran
title: DeSantis Win: Judge Dismisses Lawsuit Challenging Floridas Law to Dissolve Disneys Special District
